name: Engineer a Marvel
objective: Have your flagship or war sun in a system that is not in or adjacent to your home system.

name: Spread the Sphere
objective: Control at least 1 planet in each of 4 systems.

name: Unify Distant Land
objective: Control 2 planets with the same trait that are not in or adjacent to your home system.

name: Raise an Army
objective: Have 15 non-infantry, non-fighter units on the game board.

name: Make History
objective: Have units in 2 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or anomalies.

name: Command Many Fleets
objective: Have 3 non-fighter ships in each of 3 systems.

name: Lead on Two Fronts
objective: Control 3 planets of a trait and 2 planets of another trait.

name: Negotiate Trade Routes
objective: Spend 5 trade goods.

name: Intimidate Their Home
objective: Have at least 8 units in or adjacent to other players home systems.

name: Raise a Fleet
objective: Have 5 or more non-fighter ships in 1 system.

name: Intimidate the Council
objective: Have 1 or more ships in 2 systems that are adjacent to Mecatol Rex.

name: Build Defenses
objective: Have 4 or more structures.

name: Infrastructure Expansion
objective: Have 2 structures on the game board that are not in or adjacent to your home system.

name: Populate the Outer Rim
objective: Have units in 3 systems on the edge of the game board other than your home system.

name: Coordinate Colonies
objective: Control 2 planets outside your home system that are not adjacent to each other.

name: Coordinate Forces
objective: Have 10 units in each of 2 systems.

name: Intimidate Distant Worlds
objective: Have units in each of 3 systems that are not in or adjacent to your home system.

name: Divide Research Efforts
objective: Own 2 technologies in each of 2 colors and control at least 1 technology specialty of each of those colors.

name: Mobilize Forces
objective: Have more units in or adjacent to the Mecatol Rex system than each of 2 players that are your neighbor.

name: Diversify Production
objective: Have 2 of each of 5 different units on the game board.

name: Erect a Monument
objective: Spend 8 resources.

name: Lead from the Front
objective: Spend a total of 3 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools.

name: Amass Wealth
objective: Spend 3 influence, 3 resources, and 3 trade goods.

name: Declare Festival
objective: Exhaust 3 planets you control outside of your home system.

name: Invest in the Future
objective: Exhaust 1 planet in each of 3 different systems.

name: Sway the Council
objective: Spend 8 influence.

name: Diversify Research
objective: Own 1 technology in each of 4 colors.

name: Explore Deep Space
objective: Have units in 3 systems that do not contain planets.

name: Improve Infrastructure
objective: Have structures on 3 planets outside of your home system.

name: Discover Lost Outposts
objective: Control 2 planets that have attachments.

name: Develop Weaponry
objective: Own 2 unit upgrade technologies and have at least 2 of each of those units on the game board.

name: Push Boundaries
objective: Control more planets than each of 2 of your neighbors.

name: Expand Borders
objective: Control 6 planets in non-home systems.

name: Corner the Market
objective: Control 4 planets that each have the same planet trait.

name: Hold Key Planets
objective: Control 2 planets with at least 5 combined influence and resources.

name: Specialize Designs
objective: Control a technology specialty planet matching each prerequisite for a unit upgrade technology you own.

name: Specialize Armies
objective: Have none of a unit type in your reinforcements while owning that unit's unit upgrade technology.

name: Seize the Wealth
objective: Control planets with more combined resources than each of 2 players that are your neighbors.

name: Control the Culture
objective: Control planets with more combined influence than each of 2 players that are your neighbors.

name: Demonstrate Power
objective: Have at least 1 ship with a cost of 4 or more in each of 3 systems.

name: Activate Fleets
objective: Have a command token in each of 5 systems that contain your ships.

name: Patrol Disputed Territory
objective: Have units in each of 5 systems that are in or adjacent to other players units or planets.

name: Mobolize Strike Forces
objective: Have 3 non-fighter, non-infantry units of the same type in each of 4 systems.

name: Defend Research Outposts
objective: Have a structure on each of 2 planets you control with different technology specialties.

name: Diversify Interests
objective: Have a structure on a planet of each of 3 different traits.

name: Expand Knowledge
objective: Own technologies with a combined 5 prerequisites

name: Specialize Forces
objective: Have a mech, flagship, or upgraded faction specific unit in each of 3 systems adjacent to other players units or planets.

name: Strengthen Claim
objective: Control 4 planets that are legendary, Mecatol Rex, in other players home systems, or adjacent to any of the aforementioned planet types.

name: Study Beyond Spacetime
objective: Have a ship in each of 4 systems that contain or are adjacent to a wormhole or gravity rift.

name: Steer Market Forces
objective: Spend 10 influence, resources, or a mix thereof.
